text: Mucilaginibacter antarcticus is a Gram-negative, rod-shaped, anaerobic and non-motile bacterium from the genus of Mucilaginibacter which has been isolated from soil near Antarctic Peninsula. ==References== ==External links== *Type strain of Mucilaginibacter antarcticus at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Sphingobacteriia
title: Mucilaginibacter antarcticus
